App.title: DreamN
App.description: DreamN is a full-stack web development boilerplate based on <bold>Docker</bold>, <bold>React</bold>, <bold>FastAPI</bold>, <bold>MariaDB</bold>, and <bold>Nginx</bold>.

403.title: Permission Denied
403.message: You don't have permission to perform this action.

404.title: Page Not Found
404.message: The page you are looking for does not exist.

429.title: Too Many Requests
429.message: Please wait a moment and try again.

logout.title: Confirm Logout
logout.message: Are you sure you want to logout?
